user.title: Sign in to Kwikset
user.description: Enter your Kwikset account credentials to connect your smart locks.

data_description.email: The email address used for your Kwikset account

select_home.title: Select Home
select_home.description: Choose which Kwikset home to configure. Each home will be set up as a separate integration entry.

data_description.conf_home_id: Select the Kwikset home containing your smart locks

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Kwikset integration needs to re-authenticate your account. Please enter your credentials.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Kwikset
reconfigure.description: This will reload the integration and discover any new devices that have been added to your Kwikset home.

mfa.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa.description: Enter the verification code from your {mfa_type}.

data_description.mfa_code: The 6-digit code sent to your device

mfa_reauth.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa_reauth.description: Enter the verification code from your {mfa_type} to complete reauthentication.

data_description.mfa_code: The 6-digit code sent to your device

error.invalid_mfa: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
error.token_expired: Authentication token has expired. Please sign in again.

abort.reconfigure_successful: Integration reloaded successfully. New devices will appear shortly.
abort.no_available_homes: No available homes to configure. All homes are already set up or you have no homes in your Kwikset account.

data_description.refresh_interval: How often to poll the Kwikset cloud for device status (15-60 seconds). Lower values provide faster updates but may increase API load.

auth_failed.message: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

connection_error.message: Unable to connect to Kwikset cloud service. Please check your internet connection and try again.

token_refresh_failed.message: Failed to refresh authentication token. Please re-authenticate the integration.

lock_failed.message: Failed to lock the device. The device may be offline or there may be a temporary connectivity issue. Please try again.

unlock_failed.message: Failed to unlock the device. The device may be offline or there may be a temporary connectivity issue. Please try again.

switch_on_failed.message: Failed to turn on the setting. Please try again.

switch_off_failed.message: Failed to turn off the setting. Please try again.

device_offline.message: The device appears to be offline. Please check that the lock has power and is connected to your WiFi network.

api_error.message: An error occurred communicating with the Kwikset service. Please try again later.

device_offline.title: Device Offline: {device_name}
device_offline.description:
The lock **{device_name}** appears to be offline. This could be due to:

- Low battery
- WiFi connectivity issues
- Device out of range

Please check the device and ensure it has power and WiFi connectivity.

auth_failed.title: Authentication Required
auth_failed.description: The Kwikset integration needs to re-authenticate. Please go to **Settings → Devices & Services → Kwikset** and click **Reconfigure** to update your credentials.
